RDRT Members

The RDRT Members page provides an overview of all RDRT roster members currently registered in the RMS database. To open the RDRT Members page, choose "Members" from the RDRT menu at the top:

If you already are in the RDRT module, you can also choose "RDRT Members" in the left menu:

Finding a particular Member

You can find a particular member in the list by using filters. Remember that it may take a few moments for the list to get updated after you have changed a filter.

Note that by default, only active members are shown. You can change this by selecting/de-selecting the "Status" checkboxes in the filter form.

Click the pencil in the member row to open the Member Profile.

Clicking on the trashbin icon removes the member from the RDRT roster. Note that this does not remove the person data of the member from the database - and you can re-add the member to the roster at any time.

The envelope icon allows you to send a message to this member (per email or SMS). Note that messages sent to individual members are currently not recorded in the RDRT module.

Note that certain icons may not be shown for a member if you do not have the required permissions to perform the action.
